thread.title: Google, Apple, and 7 other tech companies hiring for high-paying jobs like crazy right now
thread.title_full: Google, Apple, and 7 other tech companies hiring for high-paying jobs like crazy right now

author: Rachel Gillett
title: Google, Apple, and 7 other tech companies hiring for high-paying jobs like crazy right now
text:
Job openings (for positions paying over $100,000 a year): 260 
The semiconductor and computer-technology company is headquartered in Santa Clara, California. 8. Salesforce Glassdoor 
Job openings (for positions paying over $100,000 a year): 270 
Salesforce offers a business software as a cloud service that helps companies manage their sales, marketing, and application programming projects. 7. Cisco Cisco 
Job openings (for positions paying over $100,000 a year): 350 
Cisco Systems, headquartered in San Jose, California, is the world's biggest manufacturer of computer network equipment. The company also builds security, videoconferencing, and collaboration technology. 6. Apple Getty/Justin Sullivan 
Job openings (for positions paying over $100,000 a year): 380 
Based in Cupertino, California, Apple makes iPhones, iPads, and other devices and software and sells music and movies through iTunes. 5. Google 
Job openings (for positions paying over $100,000 a year): 400 
With global headquarters in Mountain View, California, Google is the world's largest internet search site. 4. Oracle Scott Olson / Getty Images 
Job openings (for positions paying over $100,000 a year): 500 
Oracle is a California-based tech company that offers a comprehensive and fully integrated stack of cloud applications, platform services, and engineered systems. 3. Microsoft Getty Images/Mat Hayward 
Job openings (for positions paying over $100,000 a year): 1,000 
Founded in 1975, Microsoft is a Washington-based tech company and leader in software, services, devices, and solutions that help people and businesses realize their full potential. 2. IBM 
Job openings (for positions paying over $100,000 a year): 1,400 
International Business Machines Corporation is based in Armonk, New York, and was founded in 1911. 1. Amazon Thomson Reuters 
Job openings (for positions paying over $100,000 a year): 3,000 
Amazon is a Seattle-based e-commerce and cloud computing company. It's the largest online retailer in the US. Get the latest Cisco stock price here.
